summary: A neurotic film critic obsessed with the movie Casablanca (1942) attempts to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.
cast: Woody Allen|Diane Keaton|Tony Roberts|Jerry Lacy|Susan Anspach|Jennifer Salt|Joy Bang|Viva|Susanne Zenor|Diana Davila|Mari Fletcher|Michael Greene|Ted Markland|Ingrid Bergman|Humphrey Bogart|Tom Bullock|Jean De Briac|Mark Goddard|Paul Henreid|Martin Millard|Claude Rains|Bill Riddle|Erick Vinther
